project_intro.title: Reiki
project_intro.description: Reiki is a conceptual mobile app focused on maintaining the sanity of cancer patients & Increase their well being. With the help of an AI assistant has a personal companion this apps comes in handy when delivering different needs of the patients.

details.title: Description
details.description: The app designed with an intent of providing intensive care for the mental health  of a cancer patient to vent out their feelings and emotions by offering them a personal assistant which reflects upon the patients mood and accordingly give them access to resources to relieve their stress and anxiety so they could maintain their sanity.

details.title: Why Reiki?
details.description: Anything is possible when one has inner peace of mind and overwhelmed by positiveness.The ones who needs this most are cancer patients whom are about to face the biggest challenge of their life of beating cancer and returning back to normalcy.Reiki encourages the users to stay strong by providing them the right tools to enhance their emotional state of mind & ride along them until they sucessfully complete their journey.

key_improve.title: Lack of Memory
key_improve.description: The chemotherapy process messes up with the patients memory efficiency known as the Chemo brain effect which makes it hard for them to keep track of their pill and treatment schedule.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Mental Health
key_improve.description: Cancer patients are subjected to develop more mental health related issues like anxiety,stress and trauma due to the ill effects of the treatment which affects the quality of their life.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Lack of credible Information
key_improve.description: Too much influences and misconceptions about cancer and it’s diagnosis panics the users which makes the disease more frightening and mysterious to them.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

refreshed_designs.title: Let’s Jump into the designs
refreshed_designs.final_outcome: The redesigned UEM application delivers a significantly improved user experience, allowing IT administrators to manage endpoints more efficiently and effectively. The enhancements to the UI and user flows result in faster task completion, reduced training time, and a more satisfying user experience overall. This case study demonstrates the value of a user-centered approach in addressing existing flaws and creating a product that better serves its users.

designs.title: Visual AI Assistant
designs.description: The application is powered by an AI assistant to help and cater users needs whenever possible so it could ease out their effects while using the application.

designs.title: Mood Tracker
designs.description: Upon opening the application user can check in how they feel using the mood tracking feature which identifies how the users feel & Curate the content accordingly to make them feel better. With Emotion AI helps to capture the users mood right now through an AI camera.This option can be used by the users when they are unable to express or identify how they feel.

designs.title: Discover the Full Case Study on Behance
designs.description: For a comprehensive view of my design work, including detailed case studies and insights, please visit my Behance profile. See the full scope of my projects and the impact of the design improvements.

next_case_study.title: Enduroom Design system
next_case_study.description: Carefully curated design system to maintain the consistency across all platforms and devices.
